page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: A DAY IN MY LIFE I get up early on a Saturday morning and watch the telly I watch the Wide Awake Club. After that I watch the cartoons and get dressed. Later on I watch No.73 and Chips until I go to my grans at about half past twelve. When I go to my grans I go down the town with my mum, dad, sister, brother, gran, uncle and my two cousins. I go into Halfords and buy something for my BMX bike. When I get home from my grans in Paisley my dad and I go out for the dinner. We sometimes go to the chip shop but we mostly go to the Chinese and Italian for our take away dinners. After my dinner I go out on my bike with my friends. I stay out to about half past nine then I come in and stay up to watch a horror movie.
